Make isolated NHDPlusHR region a standalone dataset

Source: R/get_nhdplushr.R
make_standalone.Rd

Cleans up and prepares NHDPlusHR regional data for use as complete NHDPlus data. The primary modification applied is to ensure that any flowpath that exits the domain is labeled as a terminal path and attributes are propagated upstream such that the domain is independently complete.

make_standalone(flowlines)

Arguments

flowlines

sf data.frame of NHDPlusHR flowlines.

Examples

make_standalone,Make isolated NHDPlusHR region a standalone dataset,Make isolated NHDPlusHR region a standalone dataset — make_standalone,Source: R/get_nhdplushr.R,make_standalone.Rd,character(0),make_standalone,character(0),list(title = "Description", contents = "
Cleans up and prepares NHDPlusHR regional data for use as complete NHDPlus\ndata. The primary modification applied is to ensure that any flowpath that exits the\ndomain is labeled as a terminal path and attributes are propagated upstream such that\nthe domain is independently complete.
"),list(image = list(src = "https://usgs-r.github.io/nhdplusTools/logo.png"), description = "Cleans up and prepares NHDPlusHR regional data for use as complete NHDPlus\ndata. The primary modification applied is to ensure that any flowpath that exits the\ndomain is labeled as a terminal path and attributes are propagated upstream such that\nthe domain is independently complete."),make_standalone(flowlines),list(list(name = "flowlines", description = "
sf data.frame of NHDPlusHR flowlines.
")),TRUE,

library(dplyr)
library(sf)
source(system.file("extdata/nhdplushr_data.R", package = "nhdplusTools"))

(outlet <- filter(hr_data$NHDFlowline, Hydroseq == min(Hydroseq)))

source(system.file("extdata/nhdplushr_data.R", package = "nhdplusTools"))

# Remove mainstem and non-dendritic stuff.
subset <- filter(hr_data$NHDFlowline,
                        StreamLeve > min(hr_data$NHDFlowline$StreamLeve) &
                          StreamOrde == StreamCalc)

subset <- subset_nhdplus(subset$COMID, nhdplus_data = hr_gpkg)$NHDFlowline

#> All intersections performed in latitude/longitude.
#> Reading NHDFlowline
#> 1000 comids of 2182
#> 2000 comids of 2182
#> 2182 comids of 2182
#> Writing NHDFlowline
#> Reading NHDPlusCatchment
#> 1000 comids of 2182
#> 2000 comids of 2182
#> 2182 comids of 2182
#> Found invalid geometry, attempting to fix.
#> Writing NHDPlusCatchment
#> Reading NHDArea
#> Writing NHDArea
#> Reading NHDWaterbody
#> Writing NHDWaterbody
#> Reading NHDPlusSink
#> Writing NHDPlusSink

plot(sf::st_geometry(hr_data$NHDFlowline))


flowline_mod <- make_standalone(subset)

terminals <- unique(flowline_mod$TerminalPa)

colors <- sample(hcl.colors(length(terminals), palette = "Zissou 1"))

for(i in 1:length(terminals)) {
  fl <- flowline_mod[flowline_mod$TerminalPa == terminals[i], ]
  plot(st_geometry(fl), col = colors[i], lwd = 2, add = TRUE)
}


ol <- filter(flowline_mod, TerminalFl == 1 & TerminalPa %in% terminals)

plot(st_geometry(ol), lwd = 2, add = TRUE)

# }
